SELECT A.*, E.USERNAME, E.EMPNAME, D.DEPTNAME FROM APPROVAL A INNER JOIN EMP E ON A.USERNAME = E.USERNAME INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO WHERE E.USERNAME = #{username} AND LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') ORDER BY A.APNO DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{perPage}
